dict.string: Food 4 Schdy uses the sicmfood.com database to show various types of food resources in the greater Schenectady area. This app was developed by Schenectady Inner City Mission with a Partners in Community Health grant from the Centers for Disease Control through the Schenectady County Department of Health and Alliance for Health

Choose one or several of the available resource categories. To deselect a category, just tap again. Icons will pop up on the map showing the locations of the resources. Tap an icon to see the resource name, and then tap the name for more detailed information. You can also search for a specific resource by pressing the "?" button.
Visit our web site at Apps-by-george.com or email us at info@apps-by-george.com. The sicm web site is www.sicm.us and the web-based food resource map is at sicmfood.com
To provide updated site information (i.e. food pantry hours) send email to: foodupdates@sicm.us
